info.name: Nexia Backend API - Complete
info.description:
Complete API collection for Nexia fitness training management system with ALL endpoints

üîê ROLE REQUIREMENTS (UPDATED - now correct for your business model):
- Admin: Can access ALL endpoints including client deletion
- Trainer: Can access most endpoints INCLUDING client creation/update/list/search
- Athlete: Limited access to own data and feedback submission

üìù FEEDBACK ENDPOINTS:
- Create: Athletes can submit their own feedback
- Read/Update/Delete: Only Trainers and Admins

üë• CLIENT MANAGEMENT (FIXED):
- Create/Update/List/Search: Trainer + Admin
- Delete: Admin only (for security)
- View: Client can see own profile, Trainer can see their clients, Admin can see all

üß† FATIGUE ANALYSIS SYSTEM (NEW):
- Complete fatigue monitoring with automatic risk assessment
- Smart recommendations and session adjustments
- Fatigue alerts and workload tracking
- Comprehensive client analytics and trends

item.name: Fatigue Analysis & Monitoring
item.description: Complete fatigue analysis system with automatic risk assessment, alerts, and workload tracking

body.raw:
{
  "client_id": {{client_id}},
  "trainer_id": {{trainer_id}},
  "alert_type": "overtraining",
  "severity": "high",
  "title": "High Fatigue Alert",
  "message": "Client showing signs of overtraining",
  "recommendations": "Reduce intensity and add recovery day"
}
